chunks.title: useEffect — Cleanup
chunks.content: If your Effect returns a function, React will run it to clean up after the component unmounts and before re-running the Effect when dependencies change.

chunks.title: useEffect — Dependencies
chunks.content: The dependency array tells React when to re-run the Effect. If you omit it, the Effect runs after every render.

chunks.title: Strict Mode — Effects
chunks.content: In development, Strict Mode may run some Effects twice to help you find bugs related to missing cleanup.

chunks.title: Rules of Hooks
chunks.content: Only call Hooks at the top level of your component or custom Hook. Don’t call Hooks inside loops, conditions, or nested functions.
